children.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the processor is running in the background.
Gets a value indicating whether the processor is actively handling requests.

content.value: ReadOnly Property UnprocessedIOs As IReadOnlyCollection(Of TerminalInputOutput)

children.remarks: The returned collection represents the state of unprocessed inputs at the time of retrieval. The actual state may change by the time the caller processes it.
children.summary: Retrieves a snapshot of inputs that are pending processing.

content.value: Function AddAsync(terminalIO As TerminalInputOutput) As Task

return.description: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

content.value: Function ExecuteAsync(terminalIO As TerminalInputOutput) As Task

children.remarks: The method processes the input immediately and returns the output. For background processing, use .
children.summary: Asynchronously executes the input and populates the output.

content.value: void StartProcessing(TerminalRouterContext terminalRouterContext, bool background, Func<TerminalInputOutput, Task>? responseHandler = null)
Sub StartProcessing(terminalRouterContext As TerminalRouterContext, background As Boolean, responseHandler As Func(Of TerminalInputOutput, Task) = Nothing)

parameters.description: The context for the terminal router.
If true, the processor operates in the background, handling multiple requests asynchronously. If false, it processes individual requests and sends responses asynchronously.
An optional handler for processing responses.

children.summary: Starts processing terminal inputs with the specified context and configuration.

content.value: Function StopProcessingAsync(timeout As Integer) As Task(Of Boolean)

return.description: A task representing the asynchronous operation, returning true if processing stopped within the timeout; otherwise, false.

children.summary: Attempts to stop background processing within a specified timeout period.

content.value: Task StreamAsync(byte[] bytes, int bytesLength, string senderId, string? senderEndpoint)
Function StreamAsync(bytes As Byte(), bytesLength As Integer, senderId As String, senderEndpoint As String) As Task

parameters.description: The length of the data to process. Use the total length to process all bytes.
An optional endpoint of the sender.

children.remarks: The method is optimized for handling continuous streams of data. The bytesLength parameter specifies the portion of the input to process, avoiding unnecessary duplication of data.
children.summary: Asynchronously streams a continuous flow of as a byte array.

content.value: Function WaitUntilCanceledAsync(cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task

parameters.description: The cancellation token to trigger termination.

children.summary: Initiates a task that delays indefinitely until cancellation is requested.

summary: An abstraction for processing the individually or in batches, with optional asynchronous handling of responses in the background.
remarks: The supports processing inputs, executing commands with responses, and managing streaming workflows efficiently in background tasks.
